item.title: Hi, Calgary!
item.description: A lot of things happened since I created this website. Most importantly, we moved to Calgary. We are very happy to be here, and the below picture suffices to describe our excitement:)

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post, and it marks the beginning of this website (July 31, 2021).
